text: {{Infobox settlement | name = North Sinai Governorate | settlement_type = Governorate | image_flag = Governadorat_de_Sinai-Sinai_del_nord.png | flag_size = 120px | image_blank_emblem = Coat of arms of North Sinai Governorate.png | blank_emblem_size = 75px | image_map = North Sinai in Egypt.svg | map_caption = North Sinai Governorate on the map of Egypt | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | seat = Arish (capital) | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | government_footnotes = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 27,574 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 457000 | population_as_of = January 2018 | population_density_km2 = 16.57 | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +2 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | website = | iso_code = | calling_code = | footnotes = }} North Sinai Governorate is one of the governorates of Egypt. The capital city is Arish. The governorate is located on the northern half of the Sinai Peninsula. ==Cities and towns== * El Arish - the capital and largest city, with 164,830 people . * Nekhel * Rafah * Bir al-Abed * Sheikh Zuweid Category:Governorates of Egypt Category:Sinai Peninsula
title: North Sinai Governorate
